definition: Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Chroma uniformity can be further divided into two aspects, the uniformity and the fidelity.
sentences.chinese: 其中色均匀性包括均匀性和色保真度两个方面。

sentences.english: The performance is broadcast on high-fidelity speakers and high-definition television.
sentences.chinese: 表演在高保真度扬声器和高清晰度电视上播送。

sentences.english: Loss of fidelity in the data being displayed is another key risk.
sentences.chinese: 显示的数据中保真度的缺失是另一个主要风险。

sentences.english: Optimizing the fidelity of coherent state of quantum teleportation.
sentences.chinese: 优化相干态量子隐形传态的保真度。

sentences.english: What kind of the image definition and fidelity can I expect?
sentences.chinese: 我能期待多高的图象保真度？

sentences.english: The evolution frequencies of the fidelities are modulated by the detuning parameter.
sentences.chinese: 系统的和光场的保真度时间演化特性是相似的。

sentences.english: Optimizing the fidelity of Schrodinger cat states of quantum teleportation.
sentences.chinese: 优化薛定谔猫态量子隐形传态的保真度。

sentences.english: I've gotten interested in hi- fi. I'm building my own equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我对高保真度收音机发生了兴趣，我正在自己装配合。

sentences.english: Citrine is given as a symbol of hope, youth, health, and fidelity.
sentences.chinese: 黄晶是给出一个希望，青年，健康的象征，和保真度。

sentences.english: Four-way line array element of the highest performance and fidelity.
sentences.chinese: 四分频线阵列组成部分，最高的性能和保真度。

definition: the feeling of actually being there
